theWeaponMaster:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theWeaponMaster:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theWeaponMaster:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theWeaponMaster:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theWeaponMaster:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theWeaponMaster:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theWeaponMaster:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theWeaponMaster:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.NAME: Special Strike
theWeaponMaster:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theWeaponMaster:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theWeaponMaster:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theWeaponMaster:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theWeaponMaster:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theWeaponMaster:BreakerAtlasBlade.NAME: Atlas Blade
theWeaponMaster:BreakerAtlasBlade.DESCRIPTION: Not implemented. NL Hit the opponent with !D! [#000072]Ink[] damage.

theWeaponMaster:BreakerCleaver.NAME: Cleaver
theWeaponMaster:BreakerCleaver.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and heal for half the unblocked damage dealt. Not Implemented - Gain 1 [#bf3a3b]Berserk[] stack.

theWeaponMaster:BreakerFenrir.NAME: Fenrir
theWeaponMaster:BreakerFenrir.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP and deal !D! damage. NL Not Implemented - Permanently increase damage by 2 every time you break shields.
theWeaponMaster:BreakerFenrir.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP and deal !D! damage. NL Not Implemented - Permanently increase damage by 2 every time you break shields and deal 25% extra damage.

theWeaponMaster:BreakerShockwaveGauntlet.NAME: Leviathan Gauntlets
theWeaponMaster:BreakerShockwaveGauntlet.DESCRIPTION: Hit the opponent for !D! damage. NL Deal !theWeaponMaster:SHIELD_BUSTER! damage to enemies with block. NL Take !D!/2 damage if the opponent doesn't have block.
theWeaponMaster:BreakerShockwaveGauntlet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Hit the opponent for !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage and !D! HP loss to enemies with block. NL Take half damage if the opponent doesn't have block.

theWeaponMaster:AntiMagicAbbadon.NAME: Abbadon
theWeaponMaster:AntiMagicAbbadon.DESCRIPTION: Not implemented - Deal !D! damage and drain Strength. NL Drain Dexterity if the opponent is casting a non-block skill.

theWeaponMaster:AntiMagicBrahmaastra.NAME: Brahmaastra
theWeaponMaster:AntiMagicBrahmaastra.DESCRIPTION: Not implemented - All enemies lose !D! HP. NL Gain 2 Vulnerable

theWeaponMaster:AntiMagicCerberus.NAME: Cerberus
theWeaponMaster:AntiMagicCerberus.DESCRIPTION: Not Implemented - Deal !D! plus 2 bonus damage for every buff an enemy has.

theWeaponMaster:AntiMagicShears.NAME: Atropos' Shears
theWeaponMaster:AntiMagicShears.DESCRIPTION: Not Implemented - Deal !D! damage to your target and apply 2 [#3abfbe]Mana[] [#3abfbe]Burn[].
